summary: Completed comprehensive testing of GTM Newsletter Intelligence App. All backend APIs working correctly (21/21 tests passed). Frontend dashboard, pipeline view, and settings functionality all working properly. Successfully tested newsletter creation flow, agent pipeline display, search functionality, and settings updates.
passed_tests: All 21 backend API endpoints working correctly
Dashboard loads with correct stats cards (Total Newsletters: 3, Tools Tracked: 1, Last Run: Never)
Newsletter table displays existing newsletters with proper statuses (2 Failed, 1 Draft)
New Newsletter button navigates to creation form
Newsletter creation form has working title and date inputs
Pipeline view shows all 6 agents (scout, tracker, sage, nexus, language, html) with status badges
Pipeline control buttons (Start/Retry) present based on newsletter status
Back navigation from pipeline view to dashboard working
Newsletter dropdown menu showing 'View Pipeline' and 'Delete' options
Settings page loads and displays API configuration correctly
Settings form updates monitored tools successfully with backend integration
API status showing as active with GPT-5.2 and Claude Sonnet 4.6 models
All 6 agents displayed in pipeline with correct model assignments

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all major functionality working, minor timeout issue on dropdown close)
